---
id: _third_party_order_openorderdel
title: Cancel the current pending order
sidebar_label: Cancel the current pending order
description: /spot/v4/open-order
---

## 接口

**DELETE** `/spot/v4/open-order`

#### **Limit Flow Rules**

`10/s/apikey <br> Note: The parameters should be placed in the request body in the form of json`

## 请求参数

| 名称 | 类型 | 必填 | 默认值 | 说明 | 范围 |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `symbol` | string | 是 |  | Trading pair, if not filled in, represents all |  |
| `bizType` | string | 是 |  | SPOT, LEVER |  |
| `side` | string | 是 |  | BUY,SELL |  |

## 示例请求

## 响应示例

### Response

```json
{
  "rc": 0,
  "mc": "string",
  "ma": [{}],
  "result": {}
}
```
